page.title: 19EGGINTON CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content:
Out of school our lives are full as we belong to lots of different clubs and organisations. Many of us have swimming lessons, several have music lessons, and a few learn horse riding. We also belong to a gymnastics club. We must attend regularly and pass grades. When we are old enough there are the cubs and brownies for us to join. We also enjoy activities we take part in with our parents. Many of us go ski-ing, sailing, water ski-ing and fishing. The latest addition to our pursuits is the popular BMX bicycle. We can either belong to a club to gain experience or practise on our own.
Egginton School Infants' class
